channel.title: People needing compiler help

item.title: People needing compiler help
item.dc:creator: @zerrann zerrann
item.description:
@zerrann wrote:

ok for everyone who has compiler problems go to your client and go to compiler -> edit -> then erase everything in it and paste this in there, trust me it works ive tested it hope this is helpful to u all

@echo off
@TITLE Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished
pause
exit

also if anyone knows how to host a server or make a webclient please tell me cuz i dont know how to do that, and i wana make it online

Read full topic
